1.「ここは アクセサリー強化屋です。| 今日は どんなご用ですか？|<select: This is the Accessory Enhancement shop. How|can I help you today?|<select_se_off>|Add Effects|Reapply Effects|Explanation|<select_end><break>

2.「他に 用はありますか？|<select_se_off>|効果を付ける|効果を付: Anything else you need?|<select_se_off>|Add Effects|Reapply Effects|Explanation|<select_end><break>

3.「効果を付けたい断罪のゆびわは どれですか？|<break>: Which ring do you want to add effects to?<break>

4.「何を付けるか 選んでください。|<break>: Choose what you want to put on it.<break>

5.「この中から 付けたい効果を| 選んでください。|<break>: Select the effect you wish to apply from the|list.<break>

6.「この断罪のゆびわには これ以上| 効果を付けられないの……。| 別のゆびわを: I can't add any more effects to this ring...|Please choose another one.<bw_break>

7.「この断罪のゆびわは ロックされてます。| ……本当に 効果を付けても いいの？: This ring is locked. Do you still want to|put effects on it?<yesno_2><break>

8.「必要な素材が 足りないようです。|<bw_break>: It seems you don't have enough materials.<bw_break>

9.「……あっ ひとつのゆびわに 同じ効果を| ふたつ以上 付けることはできないの。: ...Oh, you can't have more than one of the|same effect on this ring. Please choose|another effect.<bw_break>

10.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>ですね。| 必要な素材を 消費して| 効果を付け: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>. I'll consume the necessary|materials to add the effect, is that ok?<yesno_2><break>

12.「この断罪のゆびわには まだ| ひとつも 効果が付いてないです……。| 別のゆび: This decisive ring does not have any effect|yet.... Please choose another ring.<bw_break>

13.「効果を付け直したい| 断罪のゆびわは どれですか？| ３つの効果が 付いている: Which is the finger of absolution that you|would like to reapply the effect to? Choose|one with three effects.<break>

14.「付け直したい効果を 選んでください。|<break>: Select the effect you want to reapply.<break>

15.「この中から どの効果に付け直すか| 選んでください。|<break>: Please choose which of these effects you|would like to reattach.<break>

16.「この断罪のゆびわは ロックされてます。| ……別のゆびわを選んでください。|<: The ring of absolution is locked. ...Please|select another ring.<bw_break>

17.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>ですね。| 必要な素材を 消費して| 効果を 付: <%sL_ADD_KOUKA>. I'll consume the necessary|materials and reapply the effect, is that|ok?<yesno_2><break>

18.「今 付いている効果を 付けるために| 使った素材は 戻ってこないけど| ……本: I know I won't get back the materials I used|to add the effect that's on now, but... can|I really reapply it?<yesno_2><break>

20.「ここでは 断罪のゆびわに| キミの望む 効果を付けられるの。| ゆびわ自体は:
Here, you can add the effect you want to the|decisive ring. You can get the ring itself|from Mr. Millery. To add an effect to the|
|ring of absolution, you will need to pay for|the necessary materials. Don't worry, you|don't need gold. You can add three effects|
|in total, but you cannot add more than two|of the same effect. You can also reapply an|effect that you have already applied. But be|
|careful, you will lose all the materials you|used for the effect.

21.「私でよかったら いつでも お手伝いします。| 用がある時は 声をかけてください: I'm always happy to help if you'd like me|to. Please give me a call if you need me.<end>
